message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. It's a great value, and I'm confident you'll get a lot of use out of it.
Alice, $20000 is way above my budget. I'm really interested in the product, but I can't go higher than $8000.  Let me know if that's something you're willing to consider.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer of $8000. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid I can't accept that price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $18000. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Alice, I really appreciate you coming down in price, but $18000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $10000. Let me know if that works for you.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer of $10000. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you at $14000, which is the lowest I'm willing to go. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
